recipe.title: Mangoade
instructions: Combine all ingredients except orange rind in a blender and blend on high speed for about 30 seconds. Strain and pour into a pitcher. Sprinkle with orange rind and serve in 8-ounce tumblers or goblets with 2 or 3 ice cubes in each.
